title: tyAgarAjEna samrakSitOham
sahitya:
tyAgarAjEna samrakSitOham dayA sudhA sAgarENa shrI


anupallavi

 yaga shAlAdi mahOtsavEna yativarAdy-upAsitEna bhavEna 
bhOga bhOgya prapancOdbhavEna bhukti muktiprada parama shivEna


caraNam   shrI ramaNAdi pUjita caraNEna srStyAdi panca krtya karaNEna 
hAra kaTaka makuTAdi bharaNEna hATaka kSEtrAdhikaraNEna 
vIra khaDga khETAdi dharaNEna vikalpa virahitAnta karaNEna 
mAra kAla tripurAdi haraNEna mahAdEva guruguha smaraNEna
